settings.heading: EASY RETURNS & EXCHANGES
settings.content:
1. Submit your return request here by entering your order number (provided in the email confirmation of your order) and the email address you used to make your original purchase.
  2. Follow the prompts for a refund or exchange. Once we receive your item(s) at our warehouse, we will issue your refund. 
  3. Note that return shipping is FREE for 7 days after your order has been delivered.

settings.heading: Year-End Return Policy
settings.content:
1. Orders placed between Dec 3rd - 23rd will have free returns through Jan 6th.
  2. Orders placed after Dec 23rd will have the normal return policy (7 days for free returns, more details above).

settings.heading: CLEARANCE RETURNS & EXCHANGES
settings.content:
1. For items purchased from our clearance section, you will be required to pay for return shipping. 
  2. If you choose to exchange a clearance item, we will cover the cost of shipping the new exchanged pair to you.

settings.heading: Refund Timeline
settings.content:
1. Eligible refunds are processed once the returned item(s) is/are received by our warehouse.
  2. To be eligible for a refund, the return must be unworn, in the original state you received them, and in the original packaging. 
  3. Please allow 14 business days from the day your return is shipped for your refund to be processed. 
  4. It may take up to 10 business days for your refund to be processed after your return is received at our warehouse. 
  5. The refund will be processed to the same method of payment used to make your original purchase. 
  6. If the method of payment used at the time of purchase has changed, please note that you will be refunded in the form of store credit only.

settings.heading: Refund Terms & Conditions (USA)
settings.content:
1. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, you may return your Inkkas item(s) for an exchange or refund for the cost of the item + return shipping costs free of charge within 7 days after delivery.  
  2. For any return made between 8 - 30 days from the date of delivery, you will be required to pay for return shipping costs.
  3. Returns must be unworn, in the original state you received them, and in the original packaging. 
  4. Exchanges can only be made for items currently in stock.

settings.heading: Refund Terms & Conditions (CANADA)
settings.content:
1. All returns/exchanges will be sent to our CA Returns Center located in Ottawa, ON. 
  2. Our return policy is the same as US orders (Free returns within 7 days of receipt).
  3. The return shipping costs for orders returned after the 7-day free shipping window will vary depending on the country region.

settings.heading: Refund Terms & Conditions (INTERNATIONAL)
settings.content: 1. For return/exchange requests on orders outside of the US and Canada, please contact us directly at ops@inkkas.com.

settings.heading: How Can I Track My Order?
settings.content: Once your product ships, you will receive an email with tracking information.

settings.heading: I just ordered a pre-order item. when will it arrive?
settings.content: Your pre-ordered shoes will be shipped according to the date stated on the product page. If you do not recall the estimated shipping date, feel free to request an ETA for your order from our customer service team at support@inkkas.com.

settings.heading: I have a sizing question. Who can help?
settings.content: We created detailed size guides on each product page for your quick reference. Please refer to those for size and fit information for a particular shoe. If you still have questions or need guidance, feel free to email support@inkkas.com.

settings.heading: Does Inkkas carry sizes for people with wide feet?
settings.content: At this time, Inkkas only makes shoes in “regular” standard widths. We do not currently offer wide sizes. However, the construction of our Joggers and Slip Ons collections tend to accommodate wider feet. We recommend giving these a try!

settings.heading: The shoes I want are listed as "Out of Stock" or “Sold Out” — when will you be getting it again?
settings.content: If your shoes are currently not in stock, please join the waitlist on the product page to be alerted for a restock, or check back in a few days. Our collections are often made in small batches, but we receive shipments regularly.

settings.heading: Are Inkkas shoes designed for performance, like hiking or running?
settings.content: All of our shoes, including our Joggers, Runners, Camping Boots and Trekks, are designed as comfortable lifestyle footwear. They are made to be comfortable and durable – and many have found them to be great for long walks or casual jogs and hikes, depending on specific needs.  However, they are not designed as technical performance footwear.

settings.heading: I got my Inkkas shoes dirty. How should I clean them?
settings.content: We do not recommend putting Inkkas shoes in the washing machine. To keep your Inkkas clean and looking good, we recommend spot cleaning them with a rag and a little soap and water. (For leather areas, spot clean with water only or use a specialized leather cleaner.) Please refer to the Care Instructions on the product page for more information.

settings.heading: Are Inkkas waterproof?
settings.content: While Inkkas shoes are not waterproof, they are water-resistant. This means they will resist the intrusion of light water (yes, you can stroll around on rainy days). However, if you plan to take them into inclement weather, we recommend using this spray-on protectant to further protect or waterproof your shoes.

settings.heading: Do Inkkas shoes have arch support?
settings.content:
Yes, Inkkas provide arch support that is sufficient for the curvature of the average foot.

However, if you typically wear orthopedic insoles in your shoes, you may want to use orthopedic insoles in your Inkkas as well. Inkkas' insoles are removable to make room for orthopedic inserts for the following collections: Slip Ons, High Tops, Low Tops, Camping Boots, and Trekk Boots.

settings.heading: Where are Inkkas shoes made?
settings.content: All of our shoes are handmade in Mexico. Our signature woven textiles are supplied from local artisans and professionals in Peru. When you buy our shoes, you are buying an authentic, quality Latin American product.

settings.heading: What does “handcrafted” mean?
settings.content: Our footwear designs rely on age-old, small batch craft techniques that are better for people and the planet. We use the finest textiles, leathers and vegan leathers to develop comfortable and vibrant shoes, all crafted by hand.

settings.heading: How are shoemakers who work with Inkkas paid?
settings.content: Our partners throughout the supply chain are paid fair living wages and work in environments that prioritize health, safety, and respect.

settings.heading: I would like to buy an Inkkas gift certificate to offer as a gift. How do I do that?
settings.content: Gifts certificates are available here. You can also find them under the shop tab on the website. They are a great gift option for holidays and birthdays!

settings.heading: What can I do with old Inkkas I no longer wear?
settings.content: Inkkas is always looking for ways to reduce waste, so we encourage all of our customers that are finished using a pair to donate them. There are quality programs across the country and donation centers that will take used shoes. Our partner organization that does a great job taking used shoes and repurposing them is Soles4Souls (https://soles4souls.org). Please continue to support our mission of sustainable habits by donating your used shoes instead of throwing them in the trash.

settings.heading: Which Payment Methods Do You Accept?
settings.content:
Habitat accepts the following payment methods for online purchases:

• All major credit cards, as shown at checkout

• PayPal: if you do not have an account yet, you can create one while shopping with us

• Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay

Habitat has created a universal sizing system that aims to provide a unique reference for all countries. You can easily spot the best size for you by referring to our Size Guide that provides a conversion table to all major country size systems.

The Size Guide is conveniently available on the page of each product.

Please note that your billing address must match the address on your credit card statement.

settings.heading: I have contacted Inkkas customer service, when will I hear back?
settings.content: Inkkas support agents are available between 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM EST, Monday to Friday. We are committed to responding to inquiries within 24 to 48 hours during business hours. You can reach us at support@inkkas.com.  Please note that we do not respond to inquiries during weekends and/or holidays. For urgent matters, you can also email ops@inkkas.com.

settings.heading: Who owns Inkkas?
settings.content: Inkkas is owned & operated by a diverse collective of individuals – artists, designers, builders, and dreamers – who have rallied together to craft our collections and build this unique brand mission. Our team brings perspectives from around the world through rich histories, experiences, traditions and cultures. We are united by our shared belief in the transformative power of globally inclusive representation in art and stories, which come together in our artful footwear designs!
